data.title: 1. Unlock Bike
data.sub_title: To unlock the bike press # followed by the OTP provided to you

data.title: 2. Helmet in Trunk
data.sub_title: Close the trunk properly & don't forget to keep it back before ending your trip

data.title: 4. Complete your ride
data.sub_title: To complete your ride, press # followed end trip on the bike.
